qualities: Institute of Standards and Technology identified XAI as crucial for Trustworthy AI in 2023.
DARPA initiative identified XAI as crucial for Trustworthy AI in 2019.
XAI helps AI systems serve the 'right to explain' its decisions.
XAI fosters user trust through understanding of the system.
XAI plays a fundamental role in making high-stakes AI systems more trustworthy.
XAI has broad applications in areas such as healthcare, finance, autonomous driving, natural disaster detection, energy management, military and remote sensing.
Explainability is used to help with other dimensions of trustworthiness like privacy, robustness, or fairness.
